extension.description: Complemento no oficial de Plex para Kodi
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not supported by Plex
Este add-on no está respaldado por Plex
Dieses Addon wird nicht von der Firma Plex Inc. unterstützt
extension.news: - SeekDialog: Make sure to reset idleTime whenever we're in state_playing - Shows: Fix rare crash on inexistant relatedPaginator - Home: Force doClose by default (on exit and on close.windows event) - AddonSettings: Use 850ms as new default for the Alternate seek fix (was: 500ms) - PlayerVideoCurrentPlaylist: Scroll titles if they're too long; allow vertical round-robining at the top boundary; allow closing the playlist by pressing LEFT - Bring back screensaver. (thanks @gbooker) - Player: Use uuid4() as session ID; keep session ID when switching streams; report session ID when sending timeline requests - SeekDialog: Don't crash if we're trying to close playlistDialog while closing SeekDialog - AudioPlayer: Use session identifier - ShowWindow: Fix regression, play button not doing anything - PlexPlayer: Add session and client identifiers to transcode decision endpoint requests - Player: Report playbackTime (time spent in current session, non-paused) in timeline requests to the Plex server - ServerTimeline: Increase timeline requests to every 10 seconds (was 15), to adhere to PlexWeb behaviour - SeekDialog: Remove artificial percentage-based virtual chapters (intro/outro are still generated if necessary) - Core: Implement faster account switching for users in PlexHome (skip server refresh/reachability tests if preferred server is connectable)
